title: STSPR TypeScript Config Configuration
description: TypeScript config-level configuration for STSPR tool.

exclude.description: Whether to exclude this specific tsconfig from processing.

includeWorkspaceDeps.description: Whether this specific tsconfig should include workspace dependency references. If not set, STSPR derives a sensible default based on whether the file is canonical/standard/sibling.

add.description: Additional references to add for this specific tsconfig.

path.description: Path to a referenced tsconfig (relative to the tsconfig directory).

skip.description: References to skip/remove for this specific tsconfig.

path.description: Reference path to skip/remove (relative to the tsconfig directory).
